title: Implication
text: $$cos\left(\theta\right)>sin\left(\theta\right)$$ implies that x-coordinate of point $$P>y-coordinate$$ of point P.

title: From the plot
text: Based on the plot, we can conclude that $$\theta<\frac{\pi}{4}$$ or $$\theta>\frac{5\pi}{4}$$.
